dct_title_s: Map of the Upper portion of the Hocking River Basin showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Hocking River Basin (Upper portion)
dct_description_sm: Scale bar lower left corner of map.
"Prepared by ALFRED C. WALKER, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"
Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Upper Hocking River Basin and quality of underground water.
